about.title: About
about.subtitle: Analytical Researcher | Complex Systems Enthusiast | Data Scientist
about.paragraph1: I'm currently pursuing a Physics degree at Sharif University of Technology (2023-2027), building upon my Computer Engineering background from University of Isfahan (2019-2023). This unique combination of technical expertise allows me to approach complex problems from both computational and theoretical physics perspectives.
about.paragraph2: My professional journey includes serving as a Commercial Specialist at Kavosh Energy Pasargad (late 2020-2021) and currently working as a Commercial Specialist and Deputy Inspector at Sakht Kooshan Matin Company (2022-present). These experiences have sharpened my analytical skills in business process optimization, market research, and international trade, which I now apply to data science and complex systems modeling.
